summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to and amending Plat 226E, Page 16, of the Official Zoning Map of the City of Seattle, Ordinance 86300, to rezone certain property in Block 2 of Bird and Esry's Green Lake Half-Acres, from RD 7200 to RM 800, contingent upon the recording of a properly executed, delivered and accepted Property Use and Development Agreement (Petition of Douglass M. Parris, Et Al C.F. 284729).
